statements: SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, public_records FROM government_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT agency_id, transparency_compliance FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT agency_name, public_records FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = true;
SELECT agency_name, public_records FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT agency_name, transparency_compliance FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = false ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE transparency_compliance = true AND agency_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT agency_name, transparency_compliance FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY transparency_compliance DESC, agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_records;
SELECT agency_name, record_type, record_date FROM public_records WHERE agency_name='ABC Agency';
SELECT record_id, record_type, record_date FROM public_records WHERE record_type='Financial Record' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_records WHERE agency_name='XYZ Agency' AND record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM public_records GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM public_records WHERE agency_name = 'Government Agency' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, agency_name, record_content FROM public_records WHERE record_type = 'Incident Report' LIMIT 10;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_logs GROUP BY agency_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT agency_name, action_taken, action_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM action_date) = 10 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM action_date) = 2022 ORDER BY action_date DESC;

SELECT public_records.record_id, public_records.agency_name, compliance_logs.action_taken FROM public_records INNER JOIN compliance_logs ON public_records.agency_name = compliance_logs.agency_name ORDER BY public_records.record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT name, location FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_id, name, location FROM government_agencies ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT law_id, law_text, agency_id FROM transparency_laws WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM public_records ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_id, name FROM government_agencies WHERE location = 'Washington, DC';
SELECT p.record_id, p.record_data, a.name FROM public_records p JOIN government_agencies a ON p.agency_id = a.agency_id;
SELECT t.law_id, t.law_text, a.location FROM transparency_laws t JOIN government_agencies a ON t.agency_id = a.agency_id WHERE t.agency_id = 2;
SELECT a.name AS agency_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM public_records p JOIN government_agencies a ON p.agency_id = a.agency_id GROUP BY a.name;
SELECT * FROM public_records;
SELECT record_description, record_date FROM public_records WHERE record_type = 'government';
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM government_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM transparency_laws WHERE law_category = 'finance' ORDER BY law_name DESC;
SELECT check_id, check_result FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_records WHERE record_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_description, record_date FROM public_records WHERE record_type = 'Legal' AND record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_location LIKE '%Washington%' ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transparency_laws WHERE law_category = 'Privacy' ORDER BY law_name;
SELECT check_id, check_result FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_date > '2022-01-01' AND check_result = TRUE ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM agencies;
SELECT name, city FROM agencies WHERE state='CA';
SELECT id, name, position FROM officials ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_records WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, action_type, action_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE action_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM agencies WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, city, state FROM agencies WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY city, name;

SELECT officials.name, agencies.name AS agency_name, compliance_logs.action_date FROM officials JOIN agencies ON officials.agency_id = agencies.id JOIN compliance_logs ON officials.id = compliance_logs.official_id WHERE compliance_logs.action_type = 'review' ORDER BY compliance_logs.action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_records WHERE agency_id = 3 AND record_type = 'Legal Document' ORDER BY approval_date ASC;

SELECT transparency_laws.law_name, transparency_laws.compliance_deadline, agencies.city FROM transparency_laws JOIN agencies ON transparency_laws.id = agencies.id WHERE transparency_laws.compliance_deadline > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY transparency_laws.compliance_deadline;
